TopicTitle: b9 aerospace and firespitter parts bugged

Articles.Content: im having a small problem with b9 aerospace and firespitter parts, when I place them, the firespitter fuel tanks I cant switch between tank types, and the b9 tanks I cant switch between tank types and some of the parts appear to be 2 in 1, does anyone know what causes these bugs, I really want to be able to have b9 aerospace parts and firespitter parts on my mod list

Firespitter dll is out of date - check the B9 thread to get an updated one ( probably snjo's github too ), it's about all anyone's been posting about for about 20 pages ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)
omg thank you so much, I should pay more attention XD, thank you for putting up with my stupidity
